nextcloud_update_event.description:
Update an existing event in Nextcloud.

    Only provided fields will be updated.

    Args:
        params: UpdateEventInput containing:
            - event_uid: The event UID to update
            - calendar_name: Calendar where event is located (optional)
            - summary: New event title (optional)
            - start_datetime: New start time (optional)
            - end_datetime: New end time (optional)
            - description: New description (optional)
            - location: New location (optional)
            - timezone: Timezone for datetime values

    Returns:
        Confirmation that the event was updated.
